conclusion: Analyze graphs to determine pressure at 600 K.
Two graphs: p-T graph (pressure vs. temperature) and V-T graph (volume vs. temperature) from 200 K to 600 K.
Ideal gas undergoes temperature increase from 200 K to 600 K.
Identify pressure at 600 K using p-T graph.
Read pressure value from y-axis at 600 K.
Verify using V-T graph for visual confirmation.
Determine pressure of gas at 600 K.
